longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 3 months beyond the period of intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of Document of Identity issued by Australia.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 3 months for
nationals of Antigua and Barbuda. (SEE NOTE 56329) 
    NOTE 56329: The max. stay is granted within 6 months.
Warning:
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents issued more
  than 10 years prior to date of travel are not accepted
